long_description: The rugged Barebones Canyon Lantern features a retractable light that casts a soft ambient glow on your campsite when you're making dinner, playing cards or reading a book. 5W Cree LED puts out 1 to 200 lumens to light up your surroundings; use the lantern on low when you're reading in your tent or high when you're hanging around camp. Charge your smartphone or other small electronics by plugging your device into the lantern's USB port. Built-in rechargeable lithium ion batteries power the light for 3 hrs. on high and more than 80 hrs. on low. Recharge the battery in 2 - 3 hrs. with the included AC wall adapter or via a USB output on your computer. Industrial handle makes it easy to carry and transport the Barebones Canyon Lantern to the campsite; rugged, stainless-steel body endures frequent outdoor use.
short_description: The rugged Barebones Canyon Lantern features a retractable light that casts a soft ambient glow on your campsite when you're making dinner, playing cards or reading a book.
